-- | Connect Reactive + GLUT
module FRP.Reactive.GLUT.Adapter

-- | Adapter to connect <tt>FRP.Reactive</tt> with <tt>GLUT</tt>. Uses
--   given window title and a simple canned initialization. Or do your own
--   initialization and then invoke <a>adapt</a>.
adaptSimple :: String -> Sink (UI -> Behavior Action)

-- | Adapter to connect <tt>FRP.Reactive</tt> with <tt>GLUT</tt>. Assumes
--   that GL/GLUT have been initialized as desired.
adapt :: Sink (UI -> Behavior Action)

-- | Simple initialization for GL graphics
simpleInit :: String -> IO ()

-- | Simple UI type.
data UI
UI :: Behavior (Double, Double) -> Event () -> Event () -> Event (KeyState, Key) -> Event () -> UI
mousePosition :: UI -> Behavior (Double, Double)
leftButtonPressed :: UI -> Event ()
rightButtonPressed :: UI -> Event ()
keyAction :: UI -> Event (KeyState, Key)
framePass :: UI -> Event ()
data KeyState
Down :: KeyState
Up :: KeyState

-- | Key pressed
data Key
Char :: Char -> Key
SpecialKey :: SpecialKey -> Key

-- | Key press events.
keyPressed :: UI -> Event Key

-- | Integral tracking frame sampling
uiIntegral :: (VectorSpace v, (Scalar v) ~ TimeT) => (UI -> Behavior v) -> (UI -> Behavior v)
